rukus.text: 82|4|dang fenmu bei jie kai de shihou,
82|5|mei geren dou zhidao ziji qian qianhou hou suo zuo de yiqie shiqing.
82|6|Ren a! Shenme dongxi yinyou ni beilile ni de renci de zhu ne?
82|7|Ta ceng chuangzaole ni, ranhou, shi ni jianquan, ranhou, shi ni yunchen.
82|8|Ta yiyu shenme xingshi, jiu yi shenme xingshi er gouzao ni.
82|10|Nimen de shangmian, que you xuduo jianshi zhe,
82|11|tamen shi zungui de, shi jilu de,
82|15|Tamen jiang zai baoying ri duo ru liehuo,
82|17|Ni zen neng zhidao baoying ri shi shenme?
82|18|Ni zen neng zhidao baoying ri shi shenme?
82|19|Zai na ri, renhe ren dui renhe ren buneng you she me biyi; zai na ri, mingling quan gui an la.
